structure.unit: ARTICLE CXXXII. COMMUNITY ACTION AGENCY BOARD

text.section:
Sec. 2-2043. Creation and purpose.
There is hereby created the advisory board called the "Community Action Agency Board." The purpose of the Community Action Agency Board is to advise the County on the development, planning, implementation and evaluation of its Community Services Block Grant programs and other programs administered by the Community Action Agency; to advise the County on efforts or mechanisms to facilitate the reduction in poverty, the revitalization of low income communities and the empowerment of low income families and individuals to become self-sufficient; to provide for the oversight of quality services for the children and families served by the County's Head Start/Early Head Start program; and to make decisions related to the design and implementation of the County's Head Start/Early Head Start program on behalf of the Board of County Commissioners.
